DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess length of hospital stay and perioperative complications of patients undergoing daVinci Robot-assisted sacrocolpopexy, during a one-year time period, who did not complete a questionnaire on post-operative recovery.
DOC.brief_title: Robotic Urogynecological Surgery: Hospital Stay and Perioperative Complications
DOC.criteria: The first 21 women who underwent DaVinciassisted robotic sacrocolpopexy and who did not complete postoperative QA questionnaires from 09/01/2007 through 09/01/2008. Any women not meeting inclusion criteria.
